类 OnePlayer

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
AllClass.OnePlayer
public class OnePlayer
extends javafx.application.Application
作者:
Comsys-ned20

  • 嵌套类概要

    从类继承的嵌套类/接口 javafx.application.Application

    javafx.application.Application.Parameters

  • 字段概要

    字段 
    修饰符和类型 字段 说明
    private AllClass.AIhard ai
    ai : The AI that play against the player
    private javafx.scene.control.Button[][] board
    board : it is a 2d array that is made up by buttons, each button is a spot for the player to click on so that player can place down a piece.
    private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> click
    click : The actionListener when a button is clicked.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button goback
    goback : Allows you to go 2 steps back.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button help
    help : The help button that allows player to look at the game rule
    private AllClass.GameLogic logic
    logic : This is the logic class that is associated with the OnePlayer class.
    private javafx.scene.control.Button quit
    quit :The button that exits the program
    private javafx.scene.control.Button reset
    reset: The reset button allows you to reset the whole board as well as the board in the logic and ai class.
    private int row
    row : It is a integer that represents the number of row and columns.
    private java.lang.String rule
    rule : This is the string that shows up when the help button is clicked.
    private static javafx.scene.Scene scene
    scene : The scene that contains the Group which contains all the buttons.
    private int term
    term : It is a integer that represents whose turn it is.
    private javafx.scene.text.Text text
    text : The text that will be showed when one player wins the game
    private javafx.scene.Group window
    window : The Group is the parent that contains all the buttons
    private boolean won
    won : Boolean that indicate whether one player won the game.

    从类继承的字段 javafx.application.Application

    STYLESHEET_CASPIAN, STYLESHEET_MODENA

  • 字段详细资料

    • rule

      private final java.lang.String rule
      rule : This is the string that shows up when the help button is clicked. It explains the game rule
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • board

      private javafx.scene.control.Button[][] board
      board : it is a 2d array that is made up by buttons, each button is a spot for the player to click on so that player can place down a piece.

    • window

      private javafx.scene.Group window
      window : The Group is the parent that contains all the buttons

    • row

      private final int row
      row : It is a integer that represents the number of row and columns. There 15 rows and 15 column on the chessboard so this instance variable represents the row and column of the board.
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • term

      private int term
      term : It is a integer that represents whose turn it is. Show whose turn is it to place down a piece. 1 is black, 2 is white.

    • scene

      private static javafx.scene.Scene scene
      scene : The scene that contains the Group which contains all the buttons.

    • ai

      private AllClass.AIhard ai
      ai : The AI that play against the player

    • text

      private javafx.scene.text.Text text
      text : The text that will be showed when one player wins the game

    • help

      private javafx.scene.control.Button help
      help : The help button that allows player to look at the game rule

    • quit

      private javafx.scene.control.Button quit
      quit :The button that exits the program

    • reset

      private javafx.scene.control.Button reset
      reset: The reset button allows you to reset the whole board as well as the board in the logic and ai class.

    • goback

      private javafx.scene.control.Button goback
      goback : Allows you to go 2 steps back. I will cancel the latest move made by AI and the player.

    • won

      private boolean won
      won : Boolean that indicate whether one player won the game. True if yes, false if no.

    • logic

      private AllClass.GameLogic logic
      logic : This is the logic class that is associated with the OnePlayer class. The logic class contains all the method and info about the current board as well as how to determine if a player wins or no.

    • click

      private javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.event.ActionEvent> click
      click : The actionListener when a button is clicked. This actionlistener is for the button on the board, not any other buttons.

      public OnePlayer()

      Title: Constructor for OnePlayer

      Description: This is the constructor of the class named OnePlayer, every instance variable is initialized in there. Usage --> OnePlayer one = new OnePlayer()

  • 方法详细资料

    • getScene

      public javafx.scene.Scene getScene()
      getScene method will returns the scene of the class. This method is called by another class called MenuWindow It creates an identical Scene before returning it. OnePlayer.getScene() A new Scene is created before returning so there is no privacy leak
      参数:
      None -
      返回:
      Scene

    • winText

      public javafx.scene.text.Text winText​(int term)
      winText is a method that creates the Text based on which player wins the game. This method is used when a player wins the game. Usage --> Oneplayer.winText(int term)
      参数:
      int - term --> whose turn is it
      返回:
      Text

    • nextTerm

      public void nextTerm()
      nextTerm() This method switches turn between two players.
      参数:
      None -

    • getImage

      public javafx.scene.image.ImageView getImage()
      getImage() This method is only used when the buttons on the board is created.
      参数:
      None -
      返回:
      ImageView

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      main This is the main class. It is used for testing.

    • start

      public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage) throws java.lang.Exception

      Title: start

      Description: This function allows you to run the program without using the tester class (This is mainly for testing purpose)

      指定者:
      start 在类中 javafx.application.Application
      参数:
      primaryStage -
      抛出:
      java.lang.Exception
      另请参阅:
      Application.start(javafx.stage.Stage)
